data.name: Apartment 327
data.detailed_description:
Apartment 327 is a first-person adventure whose main feature is a time travel cycle, which keep you locked in an old house between the years 1923 and 2016. It will be necessary to go through the same places, in the different time lines, to be able to solve all the time-based puzzles necessary to unlock new areas and to be able to go further in the adventure.

The house
The old house of the Elizondo family, full of mysteries and dangers. You must discover what happened in that house and why you are trapped with no chance to escape.



Time travel
The traditional logic becomes obsolete in Apartment 327. To the classic puzzle solving mechanics, "what do I have to do" and "where do I have to do it", is added the "when should I do it".



15 different moments in time
The more you go further in the game, the less linear it becames and more scenarios will be unlocked.



Time based narrative
At first nothing will make sense, but as you order the different narrative pieces you will discover what happens with each of the different characters that appear in the game.



Old films
Expand the narrative by living in a first person perspective the movies you will find around the house throughout the different periods. Maybe that's the only way you can escape. You will discover new locations that will allow you to advance in the game.



Powerful enemies
Faced with these strange beings you can only flee. Watch every room, cross between rooms with stealth. An unexpected encounter can lead you to death.

data.short_description: Apartment 327 is a first-person adventure whose main feature is a time travel cycle, which keep you locked in an old house between the years 1923 and 2016. In orde to scape it will be necessary to go through the same places in the different time lines.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10, 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, 2.70GHz or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (must support DirectX® 9.0c or higher)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10, 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3770 3.4GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (must support DirectX® 9.0c or higher)

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
